name: Nebulous
description: Nebulous is a physics-based puzzle game where you must help guide Commander Dash Johnson, a trapped astronaut, through maze-like levels, seeking the next wormhole to his eventual freedom. Arrange the pieces so that when he falls, gravity guides him safely (and probably painfully) to the end!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 3 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7 975 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon 5970 Storage: 2 GB available space
